_aChangeLog.text: Made the map a bit harder and fixed all of the bugs
the BSP wasnt in the zip before, idk how that happened

_sText:
I decided to remake the old and outdated surf_toast_redone and update it. Ive completely remade the map but the only notable changes are custom textures, smoothing ramps, overall better aesthetics, and a new jail. The goal was to keep as much of the theory and layout of the map as original as i could while making it up to today standards; hopefully ive been successful.
Note: i am not the original creator of this map
